#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int coloum,row;
    char in[201],out[201];
    while(1)
    {
        cin>>coloum;
        if (coloum==0) break;
        cin>>in;
        int sum=0,k=0,a1=2*coloum-1,a2=1;
        while(in[sum]>0) sum++;
        row=sum/coloum;
        while(k<coloum)
        {
            int i=0,l=k;
            while(i<row)
            {
                out[row*k+i]=in[l];
                if (i%2==0) l=l+a1;
                else l=l+a2;
                i++;
            }
            k++;
            a1=a1-2;
            a2=a2+2;
        }
        for (int i=0;i<sum;i++) cout<<out[i];
        cout<<"\n";
    }
}
